alert.note: Alert for Penuelas; Ponce (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 25 at 5:18PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Penuelas and Ponce. * WHEN...Until 615 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated and sudden surges of water along rivers and streams will be possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 415 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms over the inland areas of these municipalities. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch will remain possible over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ponce, Penuelas, Tallaboa Alta, Coto Laurel, Santo Domingo, Aguilita, Capitanejo, Marueno, Tallaboa and Magas Arriba. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
